statement.p: In 70.37 of the last 27 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{27}}={0.7037}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{27}. \displaystyle{P}={0.7037}\cdot{27}={18.9999}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 27-18.9999=8.0001 We round that as requested to 8.
